HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: God Mode:|img:News/hand-of-god|caption:You can now change tile characteristics on the World Map (biome, temperature, terrain, elevation, rainfall, stone types).|New Filter:|img:News/filter|caption:Select most / least (highest / lowest) for the following features: temperature, rainfall, elevation.|Temperature Forecast:|img:News/temperature|caption: Temperature Forecast for any tile.
